backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, roles, stores, products, orders, reviews, and terms with authorization and blob‑storage mixins plus helpers for role and ownership checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report documenting a requirement to wrap the React tree in LanguageProvider, including related files, components, tests, and confidence rating.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list containing prewritten summaries for many frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/.gitattributes: Configures Git attributes to treat various binary file types as binary to avoid corruption.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android project build artifacts, IDE files, and generated assets.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config setting SDK versions, dependencies, build types, and a task copying web assets into the app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest declaring permissions, main activity, launcher intent, and deep link handling for authentication.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is preserved in version control.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Main Android activity hosting a WebView with custom auth navigation, deep link handling, and web app loading.
Helper class controlling external auth domain handling, deep link detection, and opening URLs in custom tabs.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen drawable showing a white background with centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout defining a full‑screen FrameLayout containing a WebView.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive icon definition mirroring the standard launcher icon setup.
Adaptive icon definition with white background and foreground layer.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Resource file defining the app name string.
App theme configuration specifying splash screen and disabling action bar and overlays.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top‑level Gradle build configuration with plugin versions, repositories, and a clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings for JVM args, AndroidX usage, and Kotlin code style.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Gradle wrapper configuration specifying distribution settings.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings defining plugin management, repositories, and project inclusion.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Documentation explaining prerequisites and steps for building the Android APK.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main TypeScript module for the web app.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: Builds the React app and Android debug APK on Windows, verifies APK integrity, and copies it to public assets.
Builds the React app and Android debug APK on Linux/macOS, validates the APK, copies it to assets, and generates metadata.
frontend/scripts/stage-android-apk-asset: Stages the Android APK on Windows by validating or building it, then verifies final APK and metadata.
Stages the Android APK on Linux/macOS, rebuilding if needed and validating the final APK and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main app router and root component, handling authentication, PIN and biometric flows, and global layout providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin panel for viewing, editing, and publishing legal documents including terms and privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied screen, detects admin-only routes, logs denial info, and provides navigation and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog for enabling biometric authentication with feedback, allowing users to enable or skip setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/FactoryRese: Confirmation dialog for factory resetting the app, validating a required phrase and displaying errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Guides users through creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN, handling validation and saving the PIN.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Collects user profile details, handles role selection logic (including Super Admin bootstrapping), and submits profile data with validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock dialog that attempts biometric authentication first, then falls back to PIN verification with error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with role‑based navigation, language selection, theme toggle, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages light/dark/system theme state, syncing it to DOM classes and local storage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button component that switches between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Detects Android WebView context and wraps Internet Identity login with Android‑specific error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Handles enabling and verifying WebAuthn-based biometric authentication with local storage tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Implements a local PIN system with hashed storage, unlock state, and reactive session management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for profiles, admin bootstrap, terms, and system reset with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Provides language context with English/French translations, persistent language state, and a key-based translation function.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/en.ts: English translation dictionary containing UI strings for common labels, roles, navigation, and app screens.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/fr.ts: French translation dictionary mirroring the English keys with localized UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light and dark theme color variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Contains static customer and store‑owner legal documents for PrimePost as multi-line text constants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component.
Renders the admin dashboard showing store, customer, order, and revenue stats with store block/unblock controls and analytics tabs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Displays admin settings with a panel for managing terms and policies using language‑aware labels.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Handles role-based login, super admin bootstrap/reset, and factory reset flows with Internet Identity and Android auth support.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Shows the customer’s cart grouped by store with quantity controls, totals, and navigation to store pages or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Processes checkout for a store’s items with table number, notes, payment selection, PIN/biometric confirmation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Provides quick‑action navigation tiles for customers to access stores, marketplace, cart, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSett: Displays and updates the customer’s profile information using language‑based labels and validation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Marketplace UI that fetches products and stores, filters and sorts them, and allows adding items to cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays details for a specific customer order, including items, status, store info, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Shows active and completed customer orders in tabbed lists with navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Simple form allowing users to enter a store ID and navigate to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Displays store info, products, reviews, and lets users add items to their cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Store search page that filters stores by name and category and links to store detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting store products with image upload and stock handling.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays store orders grouped by status and allows updating order status.
Shows all stores owned by the user and links to inventory, orders, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerSettingsPa: Lets the owner view and update their profile information including name, phone, and email.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Form for creating a new store with name, category, location, and mobile money details.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Allows editing an existing store’s details such as name, category, location, and mobile money number.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Displays APK download info, fetches metadata and validation results, and shows errors if the deployed APK is invalid.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Loads and displays the privacy policy content with fallback error handling and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Shows customer or owner terms, tracks acceptance, falls back to bundled text, and submits acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing per‑store cart items with persistence, quantity updates, totals, and clearing functions.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In‑memory store tracking PIN setup and unlock state with subscription support.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Aggregates order data into daily, weekly, and monthly stats with revenue calculations.
frontend/src/utils/apkIntegrity.ts: Fetches APK metadata and validates the deployed APK's header, size, and content type for integrity checks.
frontend/src/utils/geolocation.ts: Provides geolocation retrieval, distance calculation, and parsing of coordinate strings.
frontend/src/utils/logout.ts: Implements logout and factory-reset cleanup logic, clearing identity, caches, storage, and navigating home while tracking a logout epoch.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides helpers for formatting prices and computing effective and line-item totals using bigint values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates a display name and initials from a UserProfile object with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: Wraps WebAuthn availability checks and credential creation/authentication with error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and a feature ensuring proper LanguageProvider usage.
